name: Uhuru Software
overview:
Uhuru Software, Inc. is a new Seattle area start-up that provides comprehensive integrated application development platform, management tools and services to enable rapid development and deployment of solutions in private or public clouds by enterprises and service providers.

Uhuru can host applications using almost any language (e.g. Java, Ruby, PHP, Node.js and .NET). Applications in our beta can also use any of the following data services we host – MySQL, Microsoft SQL Server, RabbitMQ, MongoDB and Redis. Spinning up new instances of your applications for greater capacity and fail-over is as easy as clicking a button.

In addition to letting developers publish their own applications Uhuru also has pre-packaged templates for popular applications like Wordpress, Magento and SugarCRM that you can deploy and start using in seconds.

The Uhuru AppCloud service is completely free while it is still in beta. Our commercial launch will be the spring of 2013.
